section.heading: Definitions.
section.text: For the purposes of this chapter, the term:

para.text: “Commissioner” means the Commissioner of the Department of Insurance, Securities and Banking.
“Redomestication” means the transfer to the District the corporate domicile of an authorized foreign insurance company.
“Transferring insurer” means any authorized foreign insurance company seeking redomestication.

annotations.annotation: D.C. Law 15-354, in par. (1), substituted “of the Department of Insurance, Securities, and Banking” for “of Insurance and Securities Regulation”.
